revised_title: Absorption and Opacity in Partially Degenerate Gases
tldr: This article investigates the absorption and opacity of a partially degenerate gas, focusing on the coefficients of absorption and opacity due to free-free and bound-free transitions. The authors analyze the behavior of the absorption coefficient for incipient degeneracy and provide mathematical expressions and tabulated values for various parameters. The study is relevant to astrophysical applications, particularly in understanding stellar configurations with degenerate-gas cores.
